creator: dpollet@users.sourceforge.net
trawick@apache.org
text:
I think you need to build Apache differently to get better debug info.
Adding --enable-maintainer-mode to configure should give more information in the
backtrace.

make distclean
./configure --enable-maintainer-mode --other-opts && make && make install

No further response. Assuming that the problem is solved.
Please reopen this report if this is not the case and you can provide more
information.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: nd@perlig.de
